trans-unit.source: Indicates that the implementing message sink will be provided by dynamically registered properties.
trans-unit.target: 구현 메시지 싱크를 동적으로 등록 된 속성에서 제공 됩니다 되었음을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic message sinks are provided with notifications of call start and call finish with flags indicating whether the call is currently on the client side or server side (this is useful for the context level sinks).
trans-unit.target: 동적 메시지 싱크 알림과 함께 시작 및 호출 종료 현재 호출 (이 대상이에 유용)는 클라이언트 쪽 이나 서버에 적용 되는지 나타내는 플래그와 함께 제공 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a call is returning.

The Boolean parameters indicate whether the sink is located on the client side or the server side and whether the call is using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 부울 매개 변수 표시 여부는 싱크를 클라이언트측 또는 서버측 한 호출을 사용 하는지 여부는 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is invoked on the client side and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is invoked on the server side.
trans-unit.target: 값이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 클라이언트 쪽에서 메서드가 호출 되 면 및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 서버 쪽에서 호출 되는 경우.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this is an asynchronic call and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is a synchronic call.
trans-unit.target: 값이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 비동기 이것이 및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , 동기 호출 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a call is starting.

The Boolean parameters indicate whether the sink is located on the client side or the server side and whether the call is using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 부울 매개 변수 표시 여부는 싱크를 클라이언트측 또는 서버측 한 호출을 사용 하는지 여부는 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessageSink.AsyncProcessMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is invoked on the client side and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the method is on the server side.
trans-unit.target: 값이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 클라이언트 쪽에서 메서드가 호출 되 면 및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 방법이 서버 쪽에서 경우.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this is an asynchronic call and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is a synchronic call.
trans-unit.target: 값이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 비동기 이것이 및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , 동기 호출 하는 경우.
